upcomingWebinarsList.description: Discover the core moves and rhythm patterns that define hip-hop dance culture.

upcomingWebinarsList.description: Learn how to structure and create original dance routines with professional choreographers.

upcomingWebinarsList.title: Latin Dance Fusion
upcomingWebinarsList.description: A vibrant exploration of Latin dance styles including Salsa, Bachata, and more.

upcomingWebinarsList.title: Stretch & Strength for Dancers
